amendment.description: To require reporting on foreign procurements.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1901 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1901 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Murphy to Amendment SA 1463. (consideration: CR S4263-4270; text: CR S4266) To require reporting on foreign procurements.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1901 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1901 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Murphy to Amendment SA 1463.
